snippet: In the Tour de France’s 14th stage, at least 30 riders were disrupted after tacks and small nails were tossed on the road, but Bradley Wiggins kept his overall lead.
abstract: Luis Leon Sanchez of Spain wins the 14th stage and Bradley Wiggins maintains the overall lead at the Tour de France after tacks were thrown on the road causing punctures for at least 30 riders.
lead_paragraph: In the Tour de France’s 14th stage, at least 30 riders were disrupted after tacks and small nails were tossed on the road, but Bradley Wiggins kept his overall lead.

headline.seo: Tour de France — Wiggins Avoids Chaos as Tacks Are Thrown
headline.main: Wiggins Avoids Chaos to Maintain Lead
headline.print_headline: Wiggins Avoids Chaos to Maintain Lead
